title: EP 101 Big James reveals he took sides in Eiht & Quik beef
itunes:title: EP 101 Big James reveals he took sides in Eiht & Quik beef
description:
On part 2 of our 100th episode we have Mr. controversy himself Glasses Malone pull up, along with his co-host Peter Bas from No Ceilings podcast. Glasses takes over the interview and him and James discuss “Prison Bandits” and we find out from MC Eiht why the movie Menace 2 Society didn’t actually name gangs. JJ Fomby from On The Line podcast also jumps in to reveal Steele’s former life as a hustler. Big James also reveals that he actually took sides in the Quik and Eiht beef,

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
